Text:
Thanks for the upload.

But could you please use something else than rutorrent to create your torrents?
Every single torrent you make is faulty.
Really annoying!

The bug in rutorrent is mentioned here:
http://code.google.com/p/rutorrent/issues/detail?id=417

@mooncar

no other client available.
Budget seedbox so yea.

Sorry bout that tho, i see how it would be annoying.

If i can get enough money for a better seedbox then i'll switch to one with more clients, but for the next few days, this is what i have.
fuck that, im greatful that youre uploading these 720p-releases, they seemed to have disappeared from the major uploaders.

Cheers for this, love this show! New Zealand is so far behind on this, it's lame ><

Permanently seeding when it's done to support, thanks again! :D

big-up, for this one.
how good that there are people who take action! :)
Tahnks for uploading the highres releases!

@winwinwin
